title: Reindeer Antlers
info: The Reindeer Antlers are a vanity item that is dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas seasonal event, with a chance of 2.308% in pre-Hardmode and 2.154% in Hardmode. When worn in the helmet slot, they place antlers on the player's head.
